page.title: 16OAK PARK: WALSALL WOOD.
page.content: Oak Park Recreation Centre was built in February 1974.It is owned by the Walsall Metropolitan Borough Council. The Centre provides badminton, tennis,squash,swimming and many other activities.They also have facilities for drinks and snacks and a creche for toddlers.They can be looked after while their mothers use Oak Park. The Centre is open every day including Sunday.The busiest times are all day Saturday and week days at 5.30 pm.There are about 3000 people using it a week.This includes children, schools,the unemployed,the general public,clubs and a few firms.It caters mainly for local inhabitants but people come from neighbouring areas to use the amenities.
